creditline: Gift of Janet and Winton Jones and The Putnam Dana McMillan Fund
description: Man wearing a top hat and glasses and a man with a whip seated in a carriage drawn by a horse wearing blinders; fluffy dog running next to horse
provenance: Madame de Rochepierre (before 1971); Private collection (in 1971); [Brame & Lorenceau, Paris, until 2002; sold to the MIA].
signed: UL, in pencil: [HTL (intertwined, inside a circle)]
title: Le Docteur Tapié de Celeyran dans son cabriolet, accompagné d'un paysan, son chien courantáses cotes
